title: Add a method to a restlet
description: Add method (get, put, post,delete ) for a restlet.

path.name: path
path.description: Optional parent restlets path to add a restlet to a restlet (to create a subrestlet).Example: contacts/addresses/locations This adds a restlet to the feature [identifier] in the ressource contacts/addresses/locations/

feature.name: feature
feature.description: Name of the feature i.e. com.zuizz.apidoc

method.name: method
method.description: Method type, must be get,put,post or delete

201.description: Method created, more information in response body

500.description: Method could not be created, maybe the method already exist or the system does not have write permissions for the target folder.More information in response body.
